sentences.en: And how’s his nibs this morning?
sentences.cn: 那么这位大人物今天上午怎样了？

sentences.en: At one point the nib had pierced the white sheet.
sentences.cn: 在一点上,笔尖已经穿破了白纸.

sentences.en: Big Screen Free Cell Handheld Game by Radica , NIB!
sentences.cn: 大屏幕免费移动手持式游戏的雷克,纲!

sentences.en: I like a pen with a broad nib.
sentences.cn: 我要一枝粗笔尖的钢笔.

sentences.en: It would even peck my bobbing nib with its waxy red bill.
sentences.cn: 索性用那涂了蜡似的、角质的小红嘴,“嗒嗒”啄着我颤动的笔尖.

sentences.en: NIB - SEAL on sweat ball valves are shipped unassembled.
sentences.cn: 在焊接球阀上,NIB-SEAL在装运时处于未组装状态.

sentences.en: T is under a sorghum, insert the dip nib.
sentences.cn: 笔是高粱杆一节, 插入蘸笔尖.

sentences.en: The NIB - SEAL ? Insulated Extended Handle System stops condensation cold.
sentences.cn: 保温 加长 手柄系统用于阻止冷凝冷水.

sentences.en: The NIB file for the document also contains the window, which in turn contains an NSTableView.
sentences.cn: 文档的NIB文件也含有依次包含NSTableView的窗口.

sentences.en: The nib is broken, it can't be used.
sentences.cn: 这笔尖坏了, 使不得了.

sentences.en: The nib is too fine. Can I have medium pint?
sentences.cn: 这笔尖太细, 给我拿支中等粗细的 吗 ?

sentences.en: The revolutionary NIB - SEAL bronze ball valve stops condensate, cold.
sentences.cn: 具有创新功能的NIB-SEAL青铜球阀能够防止冷凝和冷却.

sentences.en: The sharp nib scratched through the paper.
Whatever has been written with the pen - nib is part of its History.
sentences.cn: 通过笔端所写出来的变成了它自身的历史.

sentences.en: Winston fitted a nib into the penholder and sucked it to get the grease off.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿把笔尖插在笔杆上,用嘴吮吸一下,把上面的油弄弄净.

words.tran_cn: 钢笔尖；嘴；鹅管笔的尖端

trans.tran_cn: 钢笔尖，鹅毛管笔笔尖，可可豆的碎粒
trans.tran_en: the pointed metal part at the end of a pen
